data.title: The Worldwide Box Office Authority
data.text:
International Box Office Essentials

Terms of Service/Use

Terms of Service.

These Terms of Service/Use (âTOSâ) govern your use of the International Box Office Essentials system, website and related services (collectively, "Box Office Essentials") and the data, information and reports that are (i) available at or obtained from Box Office Essentials, (ii) delivered by scheduled or ad hoc export from Box Office Essentials, and/or (iii) delivered as data feeds from Box Office Essentials or any related data storage system, warehouse or database (all of the foregoing being collectively referred to as âBox Office Essentials Dataâ). By accessing or using Box Office Essentials, you hereby agree to these TOS for the benefit of Rentrak Corporation and its affiliate comScore, Inc. (collectively, "comScore"). If you or your company has entered into a service agreement or other agreement with Rentrak Corporation or comScore, Inc. with respect to Box Office Essentials (âService Agreementâ), that agreement also governs your use of Box Office Essentials and Box Office Essentials Data (for clarity, references in these TOS to the "Service Agreement" herein shall only apply if you or your company has entered into such an agreement). You and your company using Box Office Essentials and Box Office Essentials Data are referred to in these TOS as the âUser.â

Limited Right to Use Box Office Essentials System and Data; Restrictions.

User's right to use Box Office Essentials and Box Office Essentials Data shall be subject to these TOS and the Service Agreement, and shall further be subject to the following restrictions unless otherwise expressly provided in the Service Agreement or otherwise expressly agreed by comScore in writing: (a) Box Office Essentials and Box Office Essentials Data are not intended to be used (i) in connection with research where the primary use of such data or site is for making investment decisions, or (ii) for reporting or calculating royalties or other fees based on, or otherwise measuring, usage of content, and any use of Box Office Essentials or Box Office Essentials Data for such purposes shall be at User's sole risk; (b) Box Office Essentials and Box Office Essentials Data are for User's internal use only, and User shall not have the right to sell, transfer, license, copy, disclose, display, publish, distribute or disseminate any Box Office Essentials Data; (c) User shall not directly or indirectly use any automated data gathering or extraction tools, program, algorithm or methodology to access, acquire, copy or extract any Box Office Essentials Data, nor will User download or extract data in a manner that comScore finds objectionable (e.g., downloads of large amounts of data, or repeated frequent downloads of the same or similar updated data); and (d) all Box Office Essentials Data shall be âcomScore Confidential Informationâ as defined in the âConfidentialityâ paragraph below.

Modification of Box Office Essentials.

comScore reserves the right at any time to revise and modify Box Office Essentials and to alter its features, specifications, capabilities and/or functions, without notice to User except as otherwise provided in the Service Agreement.

Termination of User Rights.

comScore shall have the right to terminate User's rights under these TOS, including the right to access Box Office Essentials and/or user Box Office Essentials Data, upon ten (10) days prior written notice for any reason, or immediately if User breaches any of its obligations under these TOS, subject to the provisions of the Service Agreement. Within 30 days after expiration or termination of User's rights under these TOS, User shall certify in writing to comScore that it has returned or destroyed (at comScore's election) all electronic or hard copies of Box Office Essentials Data which are then in User's possession, including but not limited to copies residing on leased servers, at hosting services, on disaster recovery servers, in backups or in archives, except with respect to disaster recovery servers, backups and archives where the return, removal or destruction of such data would not be commercially practical.

Ownership of Box Office Essentials.

comScore is the exclusive owner of the Box Office Essentials name, systems, websites and concept, the Box Office Essentials Data as presented by the Box Office Essentials system, and all copyright, trademark, patent and other intellectual property rights therein, and nothing in these TOS shall be construed as granting to User any intellectual property rights therein. All rights not granted to User are expressly reserved to comScore.

Confidentiality.

User agrees that it will restrict disclosure of comScore Confidential Information to its employees (and, if permitted under Service Agreement, to its consultants or independent contractors) with a need to know and will not disclose any comScore Confidential Information to any third party without comScore's prior written approval, except as specifically permitted in the Service Agreement. Notwithstanding the foregoing, it will not be a breach of these TOS for User to disclose comScore Confidential Information if required to do so under law or in a judicial or other governmental investigation or proceeding, provided comScore has been given prior notice and User has sought all reasonable safeguards against widespread dissemination prior to such disclosure. As used in these TOS, the term "comScore Confidential Information" means: (i) any and all Box Office Essentials Data and any other nonpublic information accessible by logging on to Box Office Essentials; (ii) any Box Office Essentials user manuals provided to User; and (iii) comScore's trade secrets, business plans, strategies, methods and/or practices that are not generally known to the public. Notwithstanding the foregoing, comScore Confidential Information specifically excludes: (A) information that is now in the public domain or subsequently enters the public domain by publication or otherwise through no action or fault of User, its employees or agents (provided, however, that the exclusion in this clause (A) shall not apply to any report generated by Box Office Essentials even if such report is based in part or wholly on data or information in the public domain); (B) information that is known to User without restriction, prior to receipt from comScore, from User's own independent sources as evidenced by User's written records, and which was not acquired, directly or indirectly, from comScore; (C) information that User receives from any third party reasonably known by User to have a legal right to transmit such information, and not under any obligation to keep such information confidential; and (D) information independently developed by User, its employees or agents provided that User can show that such persons had no access to comScore Confidential Information.

Passwords.

User accesses Box Office Essentials with a unique login and password, which User agrees to keep confidential. User agrees to notify comScore promptly if User has any reason to believe that any third party has unauthorized access to its login or password. User shall be responsible for any and all use of Box Office Essentials occurring under its login and password.

No Warranties.

BOX OFFICE ESSENTIALS AND THE SERVICES AND DATA AVAILABLE THROUGH SUCH SYSTEM ARE PROVIDED ON AN "AS IS" AND "AS AVAILABLE" BASIS WITHOUT WARRANTIES OF ANY KIND, EITHER EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. COMSCORE DOES NOT WARRANT THAT BOX OFFICE ESSENTIALS OR USER'S ACCESS TO BOX OFFICE ESSENTIALS WILL BE ERROR-FREE OR UNINTERRUPTED, OR THAT BOX OFFICE ESSENTIALS DATA WILL BE ACCURATE, TIMELY OR COMPLETE, AND HEREBY DISCLAIMS ANY AND ALL LIABILITY ON ACCOUNT THEREOF.

Limitation of Liability.

EXCEPT AS OTHERWISE EXPRESSLY PROVIDED IN THE SERVICE AGREEMENT, (A) IN NO EVENT SHALL COMSCORE, ITS AFFILIATES OR THEIR RESPECTIVE OFFICERS, DIRECTORS, EMPLOYEES OR SHAREHOLDERS BE LIABLE UNDER ANY THEORY, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO CONTRACT, BREACH OF WARRANTY, TORT (INCLUDING NEGLIGENCE), OR PRODUCT LIABILITY, FOR ANY INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES (INCLUDING WITHOUT LIMITATION ANY LOSS OF PROFITS OR DATA, BUSINESS INTERRUPTION, OR OTHER PECUNIARY LOSS), ARISING FROM OR RELATING TO THE USE OF BOX OFFICE ESSENTIALS OR ANY BOX OFFICE ESSENTIALS DATA, INCLUDING DAMAGES RESULTING FROM THE USE OF OR INABILITY TO USE BOX OFFICE ESSENTIALS OR BOX OFFICE ESSENTIALS DATA OR FROM ERRORS, OMISSIONS OR OTHER INACURRACIES IN BOX OFFICE ESSENTIALS DATA, EVEN IF USER HAS BEEN ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGES, AND (B) WITHOUT PREJUDICE TO THE FOREGOING LIMITATION, THE AGGREGATE LIABILITY OF COMSCORE AND ITS AFFILIATES TO USER UNDER ANY AND ALL THEORIES, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO CONTRACT, BREACH OF WARRANTY, TORT (INCLUDING NEGLIGENCE) OR PRODUCT LIABILITY, SHALL IN NO EVENT EXCEED THE AMOUNT PAID TO COMSCORE BY USER FOR BOX OFFICE ESSENTIALS DURING THE IMMEDIATELY PRECEDING SIX-MONTH PERIOD.

Indemnification.

User agrees to indemnify, defend and hold harmless comScore, its affiliates, licensors, and their respective officers, directors, employees and agents from and against all losses, expenses, damages and costs, including reasonable attorneys' fees, arising out of (a) any breach of these TOS, including any use by User (or any person using User's login and password) of Box Office Essentials or Box Office Essentials Data in a manner not permitted hereunder, and (b) any use by User (or any person using User's login and password) of Box Office Essentials for any of the purposes described in clause (a) of the "Limited Right to Use Box Office Essentials System and Data; Restrictions" paragraph above and any representations or statements made by User to third parties in connection therewith.

Amendment of TOS.

comScore shall have right to update, amend or restate these TOS without the consent of User and without prior notice to User.

Choice of Law; Venue.

These TOS shall be subject to the same choice of law and venue provisions as are set forth in the Service Agreement. If no Service Agreement is applicable, then the following shall apply: These TOS will be governed by the laws of the State of Oregon. Any action or proceeding arising from or relating to these TOS shall be brought in a federal court in the State of Oregon or in state court in Multnomah County, Oregon, and each party irrevocably submits to the jurisdiction and venue of any such court in any such action or proceeding.

Severability.

If any provision of these TOS is unenforceable, such provision will be changed and interpreted to accomplish the objectives of such provision to the greatest extent possible under applicable law and the remaining provisions will continue in full force and effect.

Attorney Fees.

If any legal action is brought to enforce these TOS, the prevailing party will be entitled to receive its attorneysâ fees, court costs, and other collection expenses, in addition to any other relief it may receive, in any bankruptcy case, arbitration proceeding or court case.

Conflicts.

In the event of any conflicts between the terms of these TOS and the Service Agreement, the terms of the Service Agreement shall control.

Rentrak Business-to-Business Privacy Policy

This is a business-to-business Web site operated by Rentrak Corporation. This privacy policy applies to information that you provide to Rentrak via this site, and/or by use of other Rentrak sites or services that may be provided by other means or media included as set forth below. This Privacy Policy is intended to provide notice of Rentrak's information collection practices, including the types of information gathered, how the information is used and safeguarded, and the degree to which you may control the maintenance and sharing of your information. Your use of this Rentrak Web site or any of Rentrak's services constitutes acceptance of this Privacy Policy and any other applicable terms.

Personally Identifiable Information That We Collect

Rentrak respects your privacy and is committed to protecting personally identifiable information that you provide in connection with your use of its Web sites.

User Accounts

In order to use some services or download materials from Rentrak sites, you may need to register and create a user account ("User Account"). You may be asked to choose a user or member name ("User Name") and password. Please do not use your real name or the real name of another person when selecting a User Name. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your password, whether you choose it for yourself or Rentrak assigns it to you. You may also be asked to provide certain personally identifiable information, such as your real name, address, telephone number, and e-mail address. As part of your User Account, you may receive email newsletters on occasion. You may request to opt out of these emails at any time by selecting the "opt-out" option within the body of the email.

Depending on Rentrak products subscribed by you may be responsible for maintaining and updating your personal profile with current and complete information.

Information Collected by Other Means or Media

In some situations, we may also collect personally identifiable information and other information about you through other means, directly or indirectly. For example, if you access any Rentrak content, or purchase such content via your wireless carrier or through another third party, Rentrak may collect information directly from you or through the third party. Likewise, if you use our software, or provide information to other companies who share information about their customers, we may collect additional information about you. In each of these cases, Rentrak will apply this policy to any personally identifiable information that might be acquired.

Customer Service

Some services may offer support and technical assistance through customer service centers via telephone, online chat, or e-mail. Whenever you communicate with customer service, you do so with the understanding that an operator may view and make changes to the information in your User Account in order to provide the assistance that you need.

Non-Personally Identifiable Information That We Collect

As part of the registration process, you may be asked to provide information that does not personally identify you. This information is generally optional but may be included in your Personal Profile. Rentrak requests this information to understand you better and to also bring to your attention new services, programs, or offers that may be of interest.

In many cases, Rentrak will automatically collect certain non-personally identifiable information about your use of its sites and services. Rentrak might collect, among other things, information concerning the type of Internet browser or computer operating system you are using, the domain name of your Internet service provider, your "click path" through the Rentrak sites or "click-through" from an e-mail, the Web site or advertisement that was linked to or from the Rentrak site when you visited, and your IP address. To do this, Rentrak may use cookies and other technology (see below). If you are using wireless services, we may also automatically collect information such as the type of wireless device you are using, your mobile identification number (assigned by your telecommunications carrier) and telecommunications carrier. Your use of our Web sites and services, and information provided through these technologies, will be anonymous unless you provide us with personally identifiable information or have provided such information in the past.

Cookies and Related Technology

Rentrak Web sites, and some services and advertisements may contain "cookies," clear gifs (also known as web beacons or web bugs), or similar technology. A cookie is a piece of data that is sent to your browser, which will store the cookie on your computer if your browser is enabled to accept cookies. Clear gifs assist in the delivery of cookies and the collection of non-personally identifiable information, such as "click path" and other data as described above.

Rentrak uses cookies, clear gifs, frames, server log analysis and other technologies, as they are developed to customize your experience with our sites and services.

Most Internet browsers will allow you to erase cookies from your computer hard drive, block acceptance of cookies, or receive a warning before a cookie is stored. You should refer to your browser instructions or "Help" screen to learn more about how to manage cookies. Please note, however, that if you block cookies, some portions of the Rentrak Web sites and services may not function properly.

Some Rentrak products may have third party ads. Rentrak does not control cookies in third party ads, if and when applicable, and visitors are encouraged to check the privacy policies of advertisers and/or ad services to learn about their use of cookies and other technology. The ads, if and when applicable, appearing on our Web sites may be delivered to you by third-party advertising companies. These companies may use information (not including your name, address, email address or telephone number) about your visits to this and other Web sites in order to provide advertisements on this site and other sites about goods and services that may be of interest to you.

Non-Personally Identifiable Information

From time to time, Rentrak may share with third parties aggregate, non-personally identifiable user information to show general demographic and preference information among users of the Rentrak Web sites.

Personally Identifiable Information

Rentrak uses information about you to deliver the services that you request, to inform you of other services or offers in which you might be interested, and to improve and enhance our sites and services. If you provide Rentrak with personally identifiable information, we will take all reasonable and appropriate steps to protect it from unauthorized disclosure.

If you opt in to receive e-mail from us, you can always opt out of future marketing messages by following the directions in each message to "unsubscribe." However, if you choose to opt out of marketing messages, we reserve the right to contact you regarding your account status, technical support, product information, changes to account terms, and any other matter that might affect our service to you and/or any products you purchased from us or registered with us, as applicable.

You will be deemed to have consented to the disclosure to, and use by, a subsequent owner or operator of a Rentrak Web site or Service, of any information about you contained in the applicable Rentrak database, if Rentrak assigns its rights and obligations regarding any of your information at the time of a merger, acquisition, or sale of all or substantially all of Rentrak's or such Rentrak company's assets related to the applicable site or Service to a subsequent owner or operator. In the event of such a merger, acquisition, or sale, your continued use of the site or any related Service signifies your agreement to be bound by the Privacy Policy of the site's or Service's subsequent owner or operator.

Rentrak may also work from time to time with third parties to provide portions of its sites and services. By participating in such services, you are deemed to consent to us sharing your information with third parties who provide services such as processing of credit card transactions, customer service, promotion administration, and order fulfillment, as applicable. Third parties who provide, who provide services on Rentrak sites are prohibited from using our customers' personally identifiable information for marketing purposes and/or from sharing, selling, or otherwise using such information, unless you choose to opt in to marketing, sharing, or other uses by the third parties. If you do not want your information to be used for by a third party who participates in providing a service on one of our sites, do not opt in to such use by that third party when you register to participate in the service being offered.

Please note that whenever you opt in to receive future communications from a third party, your information will be subject to the third party's privacy policy. If you later decide that you do not want that third party to use your information, you will need to contact the third party directly, as we have no control over how third parties use information. You should always review the privacy policy of any party that collects your information to determine how that entity will handle your information.

Rentrak will not share, sell, rent, or disclose any personally identifiable information that we have collected except as stated herein, or in the following instances: 1) we have been given your consent to disclose; 2) we have previously informed you of the disclosure, including by means of our Privacy Policy or on the Web site; 3) we are required by law, legal process, or court order to disclose; 4) disclosure is necessary to identify, contact, or bring legal action against someone who may cause or be causing harm to, or interference with, Rentrak's rights or property, other Rentrak Web site users, or anyone else; or 5) to respond to an inquiry, request or complaint that you have made. Rentrak may also use IP addresses in cooperation with Internet service providers to identify users if we deem it necessary to comply with law, to enforce compliance with this Privacy Policy or to protect our sites, customers, or others.

Our Commitment to Data Security

While Rentrak takes reasonable and appropriate precautions to protect your personally identifiable information from unauthorized disclosure and to prevent possible security breaches in our Web sites, services, and customer databases, no Web site, Internet transmission, computer system or wireless connection is completely secure.

Consequently, Rentrak cannot guarantee that unauthorized access, hacking, data loss, or other breaches will never occur. Your use of the Rentrak sites and services is at your own risk. Rentrak urges you to take steps to keep your information safe by memorizing your password or keeping it in a safe place (separate from your account information), logging out of your User Account, and closing your Web browser.

Hyperlinks To and From Other Sites

Rentrak sites may frame, and/or contain links to, or advertisements about, non-Rentrak Web sites. Other sites may also reference, advertise, or link to Rentrak sites. Rentrak does not endorse or sponsor other Web sites, is not responsible for the privacy practices or the content of non-Rentrak sites, expressly disclaims any statements or assertions made on such Web sites, and denies all liability associated with your use of, and the content on, such other sites and advertisements.

Contact Us Regarding Privacy

Rentrak is dedicated to protecting your personally identifiable information and welcomes comments and questions on this Privacy Policy. If you have any questions regarding this policy, please contact us:

E-mail - privacy@iboe.com

Physical Mail -

Executive Director, Privacy

Rentrak Corporation

7700 NE Ambassador Place

Portland, OR 97015

Phone - 800.929.5656

Notification of Changes

Rentrak reserves the right to change this Privacy Policy at any time. In case of any material change to the Privacy Policy, we will replace the "Privacy Policy" link on the home page of the affected site(s) with a link entitled "Updated Privacy Policy" for no less than 30 days. All changes to the Privacy Policy will be effective when posted, and your continued use of any Rentrak site or Service after the posting will constitute acceptance of, and agreement to be bound by, those changes.
